::: {.column-page}

I'm a software engineer at [Posit](https://posit.co) ([RStudio](https://rstudio.com)'s new name), and I work full-time on [quarto](https://quarto.org). 

Before joining Posit, I was an associate professor in the [Department of Computer Science](https://www.cs.arizona.edu) at the University of Arizona, where my colleagues and I ran the [HDC Lab](https://hdc.cs.arizona.edu). (If you're looking for content from my previous academic life, try my [old web page](../index-old.html).)

:::
